description: Fragment of a Gnathian Bell Krater; Konnakis Painter (Greek (Gnathia), active about 375 - 350 B.C.); Gnathia, South Italy; about 350 B.C.; Terracotta; 10.7 × 11 cm (4 3/16 × 4 5/16 in.); 83.AE.431; Gift of Suzanne A. Rosenborg; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
